Speaker: Gregory
Dialogue: "Put out the light, and then put out the light."
Title: Measure for Measure

Speaker: Coronagus
Dialogue: "Go, get thee gone: if for my sake, Thou wilt eat fish!"
Title: Oedipus the King

Speaker: Rosalind
Dialogue: "The fool slid not upon sweetness of my verses..."
Title: As You Like It

Speaker: Oswald
Dialogue: "Tomorrow I shall be a sour old man."
Title: King Lear

Speaker: Prospero
Dialogue: "Hell is empty and all the devils are here."
Title: The Tempest
